      • getInitialLocation

        public org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Point getInitialLocation(java.lang.String dialogSettingsSectionName)
        Returns the initial location which is persisted in the IDE Plugin dialog settings under the provided dialog setttings section name. If location is not persisted in the settings, the null is returned.
        Parameters:
        dialogSettingsSectionName - The name of the dialog settings section
        Returns:
        The initial location or null
